summary: After his colleague and a mentor, Prof. Achenbach dies in a set-up accident, while trying to produce gold from the lead, Werner Holk seeks revenge. Meanwhile, a British millionaire suggests that Holk work on him on a similar project.
cast: Hans Albers|Friedrich Kayßler|Brigitte Helm|Michael Bohnen|Ernst Karchow|Lien Deyers|Eberhard Leithoff|Rudolf Platte|Walter Steinbeck|Heinz Wemper|Hansjoachim Büttner|Erich Haußmann|Rainer Litten|Ernst Behmer|Fita Benkhoff|Rudolf Biebrach|Friedrich Ettel|Frank Günther|Willy Kaiser-Heyl|Curt Lucas|Philipp Manning|Elsa Wagner
title: Oro
